paper_abstract: In this paper, we consider the existence of solutions for a class of nonlinear impulsive problems with Dirichlet boundary conditions. We obtain some new existence theorems of solutions for the nonlinear impulsive problem by using critical point theory. We extend and improve some recent results. (C) 2010 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Existence of solutions for nonlinear impulsive differential equations with Dirichlet boundary conditions
